entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Matapedia

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
